医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
日托中的早期社会接触可以减轻刻板印象先前的研究发现，早年接触社会多样性（例如通过日托）会影响人们的沟通方式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/Childhood-Social-Interactions-Combat-Stereotypes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/Childhood-Social-Interactions-Combat-Stereotypes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=54d4ac91-5493-4952-a26f-71169493209c Tue, 01 Oct 2024 00:20:00 -0400 Early social exposure in day care can mitigate stereotyping
研究发现精液和尿液中存在微塑料，PTFE 暴露与精子数量减少有关中国的研究人员在人类精液和尿液中发现了多种类型的微塑料，接触聚四氟乙烯与精子质量下降显着相关，凸显了潜在的生殖健康风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/Study-finds-micro Plastics-in-semen-and-urine-linking-PTFE-exposure-to-lower-sperm-count.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/Study-finds-micro Plastics-in-semen-and-urine-linking-PTFE-exposure-to-lower-sperm-count.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7fed5d7d-e551-4983-85b2-2877fe76b5aa Tue, 01 Oct 2024 00:12:00 -0400 Study finds microplastics in semen and urine, linking PTFE exposure to lower sperm count
科学家发现 Wnt 在肾脏形成中的作用一组被称为 Wnt 通路的重要信号分子在多细胞生命进化的早期就出现了。四十年来，科学家们一直在研究 Wnt 的作用，以了解其在发育和疾病中的复杂作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/Scientists-uncover-role-of-Wnt-in-kidney-formation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/Scientists-uncover-role-of-Wnt-in-kidney-formation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b943e778-c1d0-49c1-83d8-652e3b4c4cb4 Tue, 01 Oct 2024 00:11:57 -0400 Scientists uncover role of Wnt in kidney formation
新技术提供实时胶质母细胞瘤监测一项新的研究显示了成像与放射结合的潜在力量，可以实时调整胶质母细胞瘤患者的治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/New-technique-offers-real-time-glioblastoma-monitoring.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/New-technique-offers-real-time-glioblastoma-monitoring.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3e3480b9-d336-46ee-ba3e-57668f855a16 Tue, 01 Oct 2024 00:07:09 -0400 New technique offers real-time glioblastoma monitoring
研究揭示转化疗法对 LGBTQ+ 人群的有害影响根据《柳叶刀精神病学》杂志发表的一项研究，接受过转化实践（通常称为转化治疗）的 LGBTQ+ 人群更有可能出现心理健康状况不佳的情况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/Study-reveals-harmful-effects-of-conversion-therapy-on-LGBTQ2b-people.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/Study-reveals-harmful-effects-of-conversion-therapy-on-LGBTQ2b-people.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c9a4825e-5ce2-4798-aaba-168374c870a3 Tue, 01 Oct 2024 00:02:10 -0400 Study reveals harmful effects of conversion therapy on LGBTQ+ people
全国性研究揭示氡在儿童白血病中的作用一项针对美国多个州 700 多个县的研究发现，儿童白血病与氡气衰变水平之间存在联系，其中包括低于联邦缓解指南的氡气水平。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240930/Nationwide-study-reveals-radons-role-in-childhood-leukemia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240930/Nationwide-study-reveals-radons-role-in-childhood-leukemia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6517329d-581e-4ada-afce-84505c392153 Mon, 30 Sep 2024 23:55:21 -0400 Nationwide study reveals radon's role in childhood leukemia
维生素 B12 可提高不育男性的睾酮水平研究发现，较高的血清维生素 B12 水平与不育男性的睾酮浓度改善相关，但对其他生殖激素没有影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240930/Vitamin-B12-boosts-testosterone-levels-in-men-with-infertility.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240930/Vitamin-B12-boosts-testosterone-levels-in-men-with-infertility.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5f4b8e48-e787-418d-8a36-dcdd5fa94a6d Mon, 30 Sep 2024 23:32:00 -0400 Vitamin B12 boosts testosterone levels in men with infertility
美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 拨款支持路易体疾病患者认知能力下降的研究宾夕法尼亚大学医学院的研究人员将利用美国国立卫生研究院/美国国立卫生研究院提供的 1800 万美元拨款，加深对患有路易体疾病（如帕金森病）的个体认知能力下降的根本原因的理解，并确定预测哪些人更有可能患痴呆症的生物标志物。老龄化研究所。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240930/NIH-grant-supports-research-on-cognitive-decline-in-individuals-with-Lewy-body-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240930/NIH-grant-supports-research-on-cognitive-decline-in-individuals-with-Lewy-body-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3e3a84cc-1020-468d-bf68-e88ed48bccc6 Mon, 30 Sep 2024 23:15:00 -0400 NIH grant supports research on cognitive decline in individuals with Lewy body diseases
新的 500 万美元赠款扩大了宾夕法尼亚州东部老年人获得老年护理的机会得益于联邦卫生资源和服务管理局提供的 500 万美元老年病学劳动力增强计划 (GWEP) 拨款，宾夕法尼亚州东部 65 岁以上的成年人及其家人将有更多机会获得老年病护理。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240930/New-245-million-grant-expands-access-to-geriatric-care-for-seniors-in-eastern-Pennsylvania.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240930/New-245-million-grant-expands-access-to-geriatric-care-for-seniors-in-eastern-Pennsylvania.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=21cf70cc-4d63-4939-8590-155d206c28d0 Mon, 30 Sep 2024 23:12:00 -0400 New $5 million grant expands access to geriatric care for seniors in eastern Pennsylvania
新超声波检测可检测绝经后女性 96% 的卵巢癌一项新的研究表明，在英国，一项可检测出 96% 绝经后妇女卵巢癌的超声波测试应该取代英国目前的护理测试标准。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240930/New-ultrasound-test-detects-9625-of-ovarian-cancers-in-postmenopausal-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240930/New-ultrasound-test-detects-9625-of-ovarian-cancers-in-postmenopausal-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=73aa7670-f485-4469-95d6-9a572211ea0f Mon, 30 Sep 2024 23:10:00 -0400 New ultrasound test detects 96% of ovarian cancers in postmenopausal women
